content.detailedDescription: When on the scarborough beach at dusk on 11-20-2011 with my family i was taking digital pictures.  there was some cloud cover and jupiter was becoming quite visable to the left of us.  i took a picture of my husband and son-in-law aiming the camera toward the right of the ocean.  it was getting dark and we left the beach.  when i arrived home about 15 minutes later i checked my pictures and saw a whitish, sort of glowing sphere in the picture over the ocean and the two family members.  i had not seen the moon and looked at moon phases on the internet learning that the moon would only be at 35% on the 20th and would not rise until much later.  i have read many reports that cameras can "see" objects that the human eye can't perceive.  (this was a third encounter with an unknown object for me; the other two being in tecumseh, michigan and flint, michigan.)  there were seven family members on the beach to verify there was no moon.  my husband and i have the picture.  i don't have the capability to send it in this report, but i have dated the picture on my camera. i will be happy the share it with mufon.
content.summary: On the scarborough me beach taking pictures with my family there was no moon, but when i looked at the digital picture there was a fairly large sphere in the sky above 2 family members.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home from greenville, sc towards nesmith,sc after attending a birthday party for my nephew.  what appeared to be a star began to shift in color patterns.  at first glance, it was thought to be a helicopter or airplane but the unknown flying object began to shift back and forth.  as i began to focus on the aircraft and think about the object's design the aircraft would shift in intensity likely increasing and decreasing in range.  

after observing the craft for some time, the white light would appear and dissappear.  within 30 minutes of witnessing the craft, there was a laser beam that was shot at the craft and it dodged it.  the light was red and appeared to be a laser and traveling at a high rate of speed.  it shows the aircraft has a high manueverability.

don't have any video, nor camera just observations.
content.summary: Ufo high maneuverability demonstrated - laser

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog for a walk around the block.  there is an elementary school that i was walking towards and as i crossed the street in front of it i caught something in the corner of my eye above the school yard.  i knew that was odd to have something there so i looked up directly at it and it was a saucer shaped disk like, large something, hovering over the school yard.  my dog seemed un-affected by it being there but i stopped in my tracks.  it was so clear to me that it was an object that was un-identifiable (to me anyways) just hovering over the school yard that i pass every day.  there was no lights coming from it, no noise, it kind of seemed like windows all around the side of it but i couldn't see inside the windows.  there was nothing on top of the objust just litterally like a disk or a hockey puck that was blown up and hovering in the air! i stood there for several minutes trying to focus in on it and decide whether it was something that i could explain.  when i was satisfied that i would not be able to explain what it was i started looking around for someone else to ask if they were seeing what i was seeing and literally no one was around, which was also odd to me because we live in a community that is pretty active with young families especially at around 7:30 p.M. on a bueatiful and clear summer evening.  i got really scared and just ran home.  as i was running i kept looking back at it to see if it was still there and it was there, doing nothing but hovering in the sky.  the thought that was running through my head was that i couldn't be seperated from my dog and that i had to get my dog home.  after i got home (to what was an empty house because my husband was working nights) i don't remember what i did at all for the rest of the evening.  a weird thing (in my opinion) about this experience is that i didn't call my mom right away to tell her about this experience because she would have loved to hear about something like this.  she is obsessed with ufo's and aliens and is the only reason why i am reporting this.  i didn't remember any of this story until i was prompted by a conversation me and my mom where having the following tuesday.
content.summary: A hovering disk in the sky that did not move or make any noise

content.detailedDescription:
We were juniors and have sit near our house in coople - about 7 people. it was warm day with no clouds and many stars on the sky, so we were watching directly upstears. because of our house is big - 30 metres high, we had no possibility to see behind the house. so object appeared directly over us. i have seen it firstly, cry to others and showed it to them with hand. all people seen it. object was like bumerang inside circle. bumerang was rotating over center axis inside circle. object was from white metal like grey metallic color. it reflected light from earth. speed was very high - during 7-10 seconds it flyed over all sky and disappeared on horisont. i though, it could be even high technology apparatus, made by people, but very secret as for that time, as for now. it is hard to say size, but it was seen as about regular plate and the distance was maybe 500 meters.

i should say, it is possible to make the same machine, that will fly, i was read several articles about such form of flying object in hitler's projects, some machines, as people say, were built by ufo technology. and there is chinese toys of that, they fly!!!
content.summary: Bumerang inside circle, reflactive metal, high speed over direct line, big object on low distance from earth, over our heads. about 7 people seen it. about 1990.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in an upstairs bedroom.  it was early summer, and the window was open.  i was awakened by an awareness. i looked out the window and saw a large roundish disc hovering aboue the trees.  the leaves were not moving, there was no heat, and almost no sound.  the sound i heard was a humming/whir that repeated.  the disc had lights that outlined the perimeter of the disc.  the lights glowed white-blue and they pulsed in a circular motion, and with each pulse there was a hum and the lights would brighten.  it was like a brightness that was sent around the underside of the disc in a circle.  there were individual window/rectangle/sections that would be brighter as the light went around.
i realized that this was a ufo.  i watched it, and observed its unique qualities, i sat up and looked away to turn on the light to let everyone come see it. i looked back and it was gone, no sight no sound just gone.
content.summary: I was awakened by something, it was early summer.  just before dawn. i saw a large hovering disc with pulsating glowing lights. the trees were not moving and there was no heat . there was a humming that followed the pattern of the lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Came home from the store. as a friend and i were exiting the car upon returning he noticed what looked like a spectacular meteor shower maybe 30-40 degrees above the horizon due south of where we were in ahwatukee. several (5-10) large objects were falling or re-entering the atmosphere at very steep angles, nearly straight straight down. they had long burning orange tails following the objects -what you would expect from a meteor or a satellite re-entering and burning up but i had never seen anything falling at such a steep angle or appear to be as large or as close (what looked like as close as 10-20 miles) as they were coming in. and it took some time. they were falling for a good 2-3 minutes before it got weird.

 after they were about 10-15 degrees above the horizon one of the objects appeared to change direction, not very much at first, then it just stopped moving for 2-3 seconds and took off at what looked like 90 degree angle extremely quickly. then another one of the burning objects began similar behavior in a different direction. around the time the objects began to appear solid and no longer looked like they were still on fire we noticed the sound of helicopters, maybe 4-5 coming in from the north. the helicopters didn't seem to be in formation but they were all traveling toward the direction of the objects. 

at this point 2-3 of the objects that were left ( the rest disappeared) appeared to be solid and well defined in shape and were now emitting greenish light from their surfaces. they were zig zagging somewhat randomly until all but one seemed to vanish. the last one then just seemed to hover for a minute or so.

we were all pretty weirded out by the experience (neighbors and a few friends that were meeting us at the residence had gathered to watch the phenomenon) and decided to get back to reality and go back in the house. 

about 10min later i was curious to see if anything was still happening so i went outside to look in the same area of the sky and what do you know a fireworks show. no a real fireworks show, how convenient. turns out it was for some event the casino was having more or less in the same general direction. decided to go back inside. 

another 5-10min past and decided to go outside again. now it appeared that what looked like one of the solid green objects seen prior was just hovering there but the light from its surface was illuminating a small round cloud a few hundred feet above its surface which was then indirectly lighting the object. 

had seen enough for one evening
content.summary: Very large burning meteor/satellite like objects re-entering atmosphere at high angle then changed direction/speed..Objects then appeared solid and began controlled manuevers

content.detailedDescription: I reported numerous discs sighted back on june 22nd 2003 (see nuforc.Org).  since then i have constantly watched the sky with binoculars or naked eye and have seen numerous objects over the years.  i dont have the best camera but decided to try and take zoomed in photos now and then of objects i have seen.  the camera that took the photos in regards to this report is a digital with zoom that uses a floppy disk for storage.  i have debated wheather or not to file this report and submit the photos since i want to be absoultly sure that what is reported is accurate and not a waste of anybodys time.  the only manipulation that i have done on the photos submitted is to invert color & or zoom in & or sharpen in order to try and get the best view possible of the objects.  i would love if mufon or someone could enhance them better.  this was a clear sunny day late afternoon.  sitting on my deck looking up at approximately a 60 - 80 degree angle - approximately 5 or 10 degrees to the west of south.  offutt afb is 10 - 15 miles to the se.  millard airport is 1 mile straight south.  omaha eppley is 15 miles to the north east.  i was a jet mechanic in the navy and am quit familiar with military and commericial aircraft.  i have learned the incoming and outgoing flight paths for the above facilities.  i am guessing that the objects i observed and took photos of are approximately up around 30 - 40 thousand feet as they were hard to see with the naked eye but able to watch with binoculars and they still appeared to be distant.  when i took the photos - i didnt know if the pictures would turn out or not let alone capture anything since the objects seemed so far distance.  the most common factor in the photos is the small green circular light.  i first noticed the triangular object (which was hard to distinguish its shape at the time) and took its picture which i was supprised to see the triangular shape and more important to see a cicular area on the bottom of the craft which appears to be some sort of propulsion emission.  the two object photo - was one object then two, were there and then were gone.  i know what i saw, i know what i took pictures of and i know what the pictures are showing; i know that the objects are not any type of commericial or military aircraft that i have ever seen before.  no matter if you are a skeptic of ufo's or a believer in ufo's as i am - here are the pictures for you to view and decide for yourself what the objects are.  mufon or nuforc are encouraged by me to analyize these photos in depth because i would like to know what they decide the objects in the pictures might be.  mufon or nuforc are welcome to contact me for any additional questions or investigation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed objects thru binoculars and took photos of same

content.detailedDescription: See short description.
content.summary: Comet-like tail and then bright light falling side to side. located south of chandler/ahwatukee area

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful night.There was no cloud cover and it was not a full moon yet.I was standing outside of my house observing orions belt when to my right side i noticed two white lights blinking on and off.They were not pulsating or blinking on and off fast.They were like slowly blinking on and off. and every time they would do that there was a green light in the middle. the green light remained on at all times. the lights were coming from the south east and going on a western direction. we live close to the airport,about forty minutes away. but the last flight comes in at eleven at night. and it does not have flights again until five a.M. so this object was not an airplane. the object was not bobbing or moving up or down. it was just going in a straight line or path. as the object was nearing the western horizon it changed directions and started to come back on an easterly direction. when i thought it was going to come back towards me, it started to go in a circle,towards the south,and head towards the west direction again. at this time i had to get a witness. at the beginning i did want to leave because i did not want to lose sight of it. but since it changed directions i ran inside the house and woke up my girlfriend. when she got outside with me i told her what to look for. when she saw it all she could say was ,that is weird. i am a big believer in ufos but this is the first time i have actually seen something that is unexplainable. after the lights completed the circle it continued going on an western direction. i lost track of it because it continued going west and there were trees and other buildings that obseructed my view. i felt euphoric during the sighting and i still feel excited, happy. i have never felt like this before. i want to share it with the whole world. my girlfriend does not believe in this. so i want share it with somebody. i cannot describe how i feel right now.
content.summary: T object was traveling in a south westerly direction. there were two lights that were blinking. and every time they would blink off there was a green light in the middle. the green light was not blinking or pulsating.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the garden state parkway heading north around exit 117. the sky was very clear wich is unusual lately. it was at 1:10pm i was on my way to newark airport to pick up a client. i was running late and watching the clock.  when i got around lawerance harbor i noticed an object that looked unusual, it was moving slow from west to east about a quarter of a mile off the ground.  yes, i too said its a hellocopter or a small plane,  but i saw no tail or wings  and it definitely wasnt a helocopter,  although thats about the speed it was traveling.  ok it was a round or sphere shaped object and it looked like it was stainless steel or polished aluminium  (highly reflective) but as i said i saw no tail wings or rotors. i watched it move  west to east, it traveled at a steady speed and at a flat altitude toward the ocean. it seemed to to vanish when it got to the ocean but i cant say for sure because i was going north and it was going east but i was watching it,  the best as i could and it seemed to dissappear.    i have lived in this area my whole life. we have 3 major airports and an air force base all in a 100 mile radious or less. my house is  about 30 miles south of nyc  and we have planes and helocopters going over all the time. so i have some knowledge of whats in the sky around this area.  i was just thinking about it and there is also a naval weapons station very close to where i had this sighting.
content.summary: A sphere or round spaped object very reflective with no visible tail or visible wings.

content.detailedDescription: See attached video. disk-like body with spherical attachment on one side (at least) but possibly on both. see video. four engines underneath making it appear like a dark double cross with a sphere on one end very visible. dull gray with sun reflection on the sphere and the top (when angle changed). see video please.
content.summary: 4 engine craft w/flat round body and spherical section on at least one end.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just arriving from work when i saw this 4 orbs like kept going around in circles. i called my wife to come out to see this and she saw it also. they were searching light beams of light happening as this event was happening.
we both have also seen on various occasion a star like very bright with like a red tail as well. we see this very often. also my wife as she was going to work crossing the bridge saw a rectangular with half red and green lights stationary over the water.
she had to keep driving so she does not know what happened after she saw it.
content.summary: Like 4 orbs kept going in circles, beam of search lights were also going on when this was happening. also very frequent i see like a star shape very bright with like a red tail.

content.detailedDescription: Photos taken from cell phone in longview wa on nichols blvd saw red lights likevthree fire balls got out of patrol car and saw a craft floating silently crossing tree line then hovered on 18th ave and nichols blvd i shined my spotlight on it and it begun humming buzzing louder then s power line begun turning grey color almost to a t like a cloud smelled of sulfur air felt electriclly charged then surged in sound and begun getting brighter and zoomed off at about 800 mph from a dead stop heading into oregon from washington state it was crazy three black two bladed  helicopters following   fast but they made no sound at all usally chinook helicopters are very loud these were silent can't leave name do to my job or be contacted about this report at all... were informed to never report these or comment in any way about these reports which i feel is wrong officals make people feel crazy when reporting these sightings when really one time or another we've all seen them this was my first so close about 20ft above my head no joke look at photos. also three black crown vics and a newer chevy tahoe followed below on ground following craft plates were white and said government in blue at top and an anchor on left side in front of plate number truer to run plate came back on ncic as un authorized to check plate with a phone number then dispatch supervisor wanted to know why i was running that plate sounded like someone was thier asking him questions in background and giving questions to ask i stated at approx 18:35 that vehical ran a red light and thought he was 10-26 dui......
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was flying straight line looked like fireballs then turned into a cloud like color went silent and hovered after i shined my spotlight on it from patrol car  made a buzzing sound then almost looked like a cloud smelled of sulfur shut down street lights

content.detailedDescription:
Photographer noticed the object (entity) in a happenstance manner. the object moves about the sky in a small area in a constant "wormlike" manner.

the entity moves about the sky - not as if it is questing for anything - random movements with a sort of intelligence to it.


appearance has taken place from 11-15 thru 11-20, 2011. this is appearing over the pacific ocean just outside of baja.

the entity appears to be tube shaped, with a glowing mist body. two red eyes appearing as horizontal slits. entity observed photographer and moved toward photographer who vacated area immediately. 

this entity appears over ocean at a height of approx. 10 degrees, unknown distance from observer.

the observer, once the entity "looked" at her became very upset and fatigued. not known if related to interaction with entity. observer has refused to enter into contact again, if in fact contact was established or attempted by the entity.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Worm like entity

content.detailedDescription:
We followed what we thought must be an air-balloon in the night sky.
brightly lit, and the color of flame, we followed a spherical shaped object about the size of a golf ball held at arms length, as it moved silently through the sky, just above the tree tops. we pulled over to get a better look and to see if we could hear anything. the glowing object was hovering directly in front of us and we couldn't believe what we were seeing! this was not a helicopter, nor was it a hot air balloon! it hovered in front of us across the road for a few seconds and then my son said " did you guys see that?!!" all i saw was that it was gone, i must have blinked! my son saw it speed away in what he said was less than an instant. it had to be quicker than a blink. we waited for a few minutes to see if it would return and nothing did. i've see countless plains at night as my home is directly under flight lines for bradley airport. i've seen countless helicopters and i'm familiar with their sound and appearance at night. there were no blinking lights on the object. it moved in a straight line from east to west very slowly and just above the tree line. after hovering for a few seconds it was gone. none of us have seen anything like this and we do not claim to know what it was we were watching. it is our hope that others saw this as well and will also report to mufon. 

thank you for all your hard work. perhaps one day we will have full disclosure. 

a.C. from manchester ct
content.summary: Three of us saw what we thought was an airballoon, due to the orange glow in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 others were traveling back from _______ in _____ after visiting a hotspot for ufos on the illinois/wisconsin border.  we were on a backroad just coming out of a rolling hill valley when we saw it of to the right of the veicle. it was fairly cloudy that night so when we first saw it, we weren't for sure what it quite was.  it was passing in and out of clouds for a good minute.  then it showed itself fully out of the cloud cover, and we could definitively make out a perfect triangle, with 3 lights on the corners.  it was about 500 to 600 ft in tangential length and about 300 ft wide.  it was pitch black also.  it was by far the largest traiangular ufo i have seen.
content.summary: Pitch black/semi-transparent tetrahedral

content.detailedDescription: Estado parado en mi edificio, me doy cuenta que hay un objeto muy brillante sobre el horizonte, inmediatamente revise la carta astron���mica del momento y sobre ese lugar no hay planetas, ni estrellas muy brillantes,  asumo entonces que es un objeto son identificar
content.summary: Sobre el horizonte, estático, brillante, no hay planetas en el momento cerca del objeto

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on our back porch at about 10:00 at night. our house faced southwest from highlands ranch / daniels gate park. we watched an obeject that was a very large craft. maybe even a mile to two miles wide. the craft was boomeranged in shape. 

the craft came from out of the mountains and it hovered vertically at about 2,000 to four thousand feet about the mountian. the craft stayed stationary for about two to three minutes. we both looked at each other stunned. 

the craft went from a stationary position to what seemed like the speed of light east ward where it disappeared. the craft at no time made any sound. 
it was completetly solid white in color. 

the boomerang had hard corners not soft like a boomerang. it was a geomoetrical hard angle boomerang that rose vertically and stayed vertical.
content.summary: Very large boomerang shaped ufo came out of the moutians hovered vertically at maybe 2000 feet at the speed of light went east ward

content.detailedDescription:
This report is a follow-up to the sighting of tues., oct. 25 which was contained in my report regarding the multiple sightings on sat., oct. 22, 2011.  (i have submitted information on all these sightings to the mufon investigator by mail.) 

i have recently discussed this particular sighting with my next door neighbor, since she and her teenage son witnessed this event in front of our properties.  i wanted to ask her if she saw what i saw that night.  because it was her first sighting of anything like this, she was visibly upset and was saying over and over "this is weird, oh, this is just too weird!", i did not want to upset her further.  as we were standing in her driveway observing this object, she handed me back my binocs at one point when the "craft" was flying over our heads toward the southeast from read mountain.  (i believe her realization that it was indeed a craft, not just lights, was the tipping point of her emotions, and that is why she handed me the binocs.)  i looked through the binocs and saw that the large "bright light" we had been observing was really what i can only describe as an elongated dumbell shaped craft.  on each end was a large, glowing, vivid cherry-red light.  stretched between them was an elongated oval that was a soft, tanish-yellow color, and in the middle of that oval was another smaller elongated oval that was a soft blue-white color.  i know this sounds weird, but that's what it looked like to me...And she confirmed to me that was basically what she saw as well.   

[i personally believe that we were looking at the back side of the craft as it was flying away from us; and perhaps the soft, blue-white colored elongated oval in the middle might have been a long narrow window.] 

at one point, i handed her back the binocs because i too was in an emotional state.  she watched it continue to fly across the valley in a southeasterly direction toward the vinton area; she then stated, "oh, that's weird, it just dropped straight down very fast and disappeared!"  i was watching it fly across the valley without binocs, so to me, it looked like it just "blinked" out.

needless to say, my observation of several sightings over the past month have taken a toll on my desire to witness anymore.  i have decided to limit the number of evening potty trips for my dog and carefully pick the time frame of each to avoid any possible sighting again.  at this point, i refrain from looking out my front windows at night unless i really have to take my dog out to potty, and only do so once i think the sky is clear.  i keep telling myself they are not going to bother me, but it's just to soon to feel comfortable just yet!

i truly do not want to see anymore of these "things"!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Additional info regarding oct. 25 sighting over read mt., roanoke, va

content.detailedDescription: It was flying in the night sky, glowing an orange-ish color. and before my eyes, it started turing blue and then it dissapeared into the night sky. a couple weeks before i saw that, i saw something similar to that. i was getting the mail at night becausei forgot to get it in the morning, and then i looked in the sky, and saw a little orange circle hovering and then turned blue and dissapeared. i've seen these ufo's in mojave a lot. once also at a party.
content.summary: Orange, little, hovering

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened in 1955 and i would have been 5 years old. we lived on an acreage north of edmonton on the st. albert trail just across from present day nelson lumber.

my dad had been drinking and he and my mom got into a fight. as it would happen, my mom slept with my siter (who would have been one year old at the time) and my dad and i ended up on the fold-out couch in the living room.

in the middle of the night i was awoken by my dad's snoring and i sat up. i saw an entiy standing over us beside the bed and another one over by the living room door. i was terrified and dove under the covers and snuggled up to my dad who did not wake up. i hid for about 5 minutes before peering out to see that they were gone.

the next morning i told my parents that we had two giraffes in the living room. they just laughed and told me it was a bad dream. i accepted that.

what i saw was quite vivid and i kept recounting what it was that i saw.

i was not a believer in ufo's until 2 years ago when i had my first sighting. i am an engineer and defintely understand what i saw. since then i have had 3 more sightings that could only be ufo's, and many more which i could not definetly determine. the 4 have been reported to mufon and aufosg.

i have done much reading on the suject and read as many sighting reports as i can. some reports are real and some are fabricated stories.

i am an avid fan of ufo hunters and ancient aliens. it was during one of these episodes that i realized what i had seen. see attached. the entities that i saw were just like the attached except they did not have helmets or head dresses on.
content.summary: Revelations / contact / egyptian god

content.detailedDescription: I was droping off my boyfriend after watching breaking dawn when he tells me wtf is that at first there were 2 lights and 1 just disappered so we followed the light and it disappered while i'm recording it then another ball shapped light appears and i'm still recording it would change directions very cool then that disappeared we saw about 3 of them and i was lucky to record it all. i gave become a believer i couldn't sleep but in a way i feel like this was a dream that i manage to catch on my phone. i have 4 videos of this i posted them on youtube
content.summary: I have videos it was bright and would disapper i just became a believer

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

     i thought i'd follow the phone message i just left with an email. my wife and i live in mckeesport, pa. this morning, at approximately 11:15--11:20 a.M., we were driving north on myer blvd. in mckeesport. i stopped at the stop sign at the intersection of myer and riverview and my eye was immediately drawn to a bright light visible in the sky directly ahead of me above the northern horizon. i saw that the light was reflecting from a metallic silver object, and i thought it was odd because it seemed so much brighter than the jets or planes i've seen before in the sky. my instant reaction was to think this was a conventional aircraft of some kind, and i watched it, thinking that in a second or two a wing structure would become visible as the craft moved toward the north-east. when no wing structure appeared after a few seconds, i called my wife's attention to the object. she immediately saw it at that point and was as puzzled by it as i was.
     the object appeared to be cigar shaped. it was metallic and silvery looking. there were no wings, propellers, lights, or markings visible anywhere on it. the object left no contrail, nor could we hear any sound coming from it (although a sound would have been hard to hear because our car's engine was running and our windows were not rolled down.) in the center of the aircraft appeared what looked like a series of rectangular windows. (my wife said she didn't see this feature.) it was moving in a slightly north-easterly direction at about the same speed as a conventional aircraft would move. with growing curiosity, i turned the car left and drove up riverview in order to track the object and keep it in sight. we watched it head into the north-east for a while, and then it suddenly vanished. i don't know if it flew behind the clouds. we suddenly were unable to find it in the sky.
     
     sincerely,

(name and phone number moved to fi box) csm 11/19/11 12:49 cst flg
content.summary: Cigar shaped mettalic object sighted in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the san luis valley of southern colorado. last night around 6:15 pm mountain time i was out walking and saw what looked like a star flare up to about the size of a full moon then quickly return to normal. i was starring at the star when it flared and it was still there when the flare went away. looked like an explosion.

right after the flare i noticed a small light moving due west away from the star. no flashing lights it looked like a satelite moving across the sky.

the flare was located due south of my position about four fist widths up from the horizon. the flare didn't move it started as a point of light expanded to about the size of the full moon then return to a point of light. now it could have been an object in front of the star or near the star.

did anyone else see this event?
content.summary: Ufo sighting in the san luis valley

content.detailedDescription:
My (now ex-husband) and our three sons were out driving around in our immediate area from our apartment to do a little house hunting. we were driving around looking for houses that were for sale because we were interested in buying a house. we approached a stop sign when my eldest son says to us "what is that? what is that?" with the 2 youngest boys in the backseat asleep, we didn't know what he was referring to so we asked him, "what is what?" he said "those lights". still sitting at the stop sign, we asked him where and when we looked up and out of the car window, we saw three luminous lights just hovering in the sky to the east of us. we sat there in awe of what we saw because these lights appeard to come from nowhere; there were no crafts of any sort visible that would have been emitting the lights. my husband said to me that it appeard as though the crafts were cloaked. 

not knowing what the lights were, we decided to cut our house hunting short and go home, but first we needed to stop at the grocery store. we drove the 5 minutes or so to the grocery store and when we parked our car in the parked lot, we all got out and looked up because the lights were still hovering. 

we wacthed the evening news to see if there were any reports and the next night on the news, they issued a statement saying that lights were seen as far north as jacksonville florida, but that no one would say what they thought it was. 

when i watched the "fayetteville incident" program on tv yesterday, the lights he saw are exactly like the lights i saw and so i wnated to report my story to you. 

i no longer live in west palm beach, but my ex-husband does and as far as i know, neither one of us has ever seen lights like that again.
content.summary: While driving in the car with the family, we saw three lights coming out of nowhere in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i was directed by some super intelligent force to witness what i saw on a clear day right above my driveway, around 11:15 am in july of 2008,
which was a 747 jet flying east overhead of my neighborhood, with one strange looking orb, silvery in color, flying right behind it.
i kept looking back down at the ground, and up again, to see if my eyes were playing tricks on me, and looked back up, and it was still behind the jet. i then thought i needed to return inside because it was so strange i thought i was seeing things.
when i went back outside several minutes later, i saw the orb again, this time going backwards the exact way it came,at the same altitude, like it was escorting the jet, and then returning to whereever it came from. it was going the same speed as the jet which was interesting, 
matching the speed, and separation.(150-200 mph)
lost sight of it over the western horizon becasue our neighborhood is on a hill with many trees which used to be an apple orchard.
i don't see this kind of stuff every day,and thought i needed to make a record of it for mufon.
the object was going due east with the jet,under it and behind it,and then due west several minutes later. i called the faa and of course they dint see it on their radar, and could not tell me the flight number of the plane i saw either.
does anyone else have a similar report?
content.summary: 7/08 orb flies behind airliners' tail,  then goes back the way it came...

content.detailedDescription:
I can't forget it.  i hope by telling my story i can let it go.  it only happened once in houston, texas.  my youngest daughter was about 2 years old and whenever she saw an airplane she would point up and say, "plane, mommie."  my husband wanted us to drive out with him to see about getting a tire fixed or replaced on our convertible caddilac.  it was a hot summer day, and my husband let the top down off the caddilac.  we arrived at the tire shop early it was after 10:00am, but i do not think after 12:00.  i remember thinking it was early and not much traffic was at the tire shop.  

my husband parked the car in the parking lot in front of the tire building and we decided to stay in the car.  after my husband left the car and went into the building a plane happened to be going by at some point.  my daughter saw it and said, "look plane mommie."  i looked up and to my astonishment i saw about 7 or 8 bright lights in the sky.  they looked circular from the distance and they were bright like a star, reflecting light.  they were initally in some like of form as they moved closser in my direction, it seemed.  then suddenly they broke that formation and scattered about ramdomly it seemed.  they hovered and darted from side to side.  they moved from one spot to another and then hovered a bit.  an airliner was going by and i said to myself, surely they are seeing this on their radat.  i was in a state of bewilderment, i looked away for one instant to rub my eyes out of disbelief.  however, i know what i saw and when i looked back up within an instant, the moving, darting, circular, hovering, lights were gone. i looked around and no one was looking, if anyone was around.   i kept looking up at the sky to see if they returned but they did not.  then it occured to my that i could not be the only who saw the ufo's, sio i began to turn the radio station to hear about the sighting........To my surprize there were no sightings reported.

when my husband returned to the car, i told him the story.  he did not know how to respond at first.  i was somewhat frantic and searching the radio for facts about recent sighting.  there were none.  later that day when we returned home, i turned from station to station on television news and there was nothing. 

nasa was close and the plane had to have picked up the activity from the plans, i assumed so how come there is nothing about the sighting i witnessed?  i had heard there was a cover up that began early in the sighting history in america, i now was beginning to believe that was true.  

my daughter is now 36 amd that happened when she was about 2 years old at the least and about 3 at the most, which means it was 1975 or 1976 when i saw this maurade of unidentified space crafts in the houston sky.  

when i tried to tell my mother she refused to listen.  so, i have not shared it unless i am in the presence of someone who has had some paranormal experience or seen a ufo.  when i saw mufon i was given the mind to share my experience.  it is nothing i can prove, and it was so long ago, but i remember it vividly as if it was yesterday.  this happened in the daylight......And the lights were very visible, it was awesome.

if anyone else saw these ufo's in houston, texas around 1975 ot 1976 please let me know.  i would love to hear your story.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the year 0f 1975 or 1976, in houston, texas, i saw a number of ufo's flying in the sky.  they stopped in the air and hovered, then darted from one spot to another, i rubbed my eyes and looked again and they were gone.

content.detailedDescription: The event took place on no.10.2011 at night about 23:30 local time above bangkok. i was in flight 053 bkk to teh, a few minutes after take off i noticed a trianglular shaped object flying in opposite direction. it's shape could be recognized just by three red lights  located apart. at first, i assumed it was an aircraft but as our plain increased its altitude the  flying object got more definable by city lights coming into context. it was totally transparent hence i could see city lights through it. this object could only be detected by presence of those three red lights.
content.summary: Triangle ufo above bangkok

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright light heading west/north from the 405n over the 710n to the 91west. bright light the was shaking, only one light. looked like it was fighting to stay light up sa it moved higher. then it just went out.
content.summary: Bright light that was moving up and was loosing power

content.detailedDescription: I was playing tag at school when i saw a sphere or circle hovering under a c130.  it was hovering at an obtuse angle without the points .  it was moving in a curved line pattern.  it lasted for only a few minutes, less than 5.  when we went inside for lunch, it was still moving very slowly.  it could have only been two things, a plane called the super hornet or a ufo.  as we went inside, that was the last that i saw.
content.summary: I was at school playing tag when i saw a dull white dot hovering under a c-130,
